raw: Football must not restart until strain on NHS eases, says Watford chairman .
replaced: Football must not restart until strain on NHS eases, says Watford chairman .

raw: The Watford chairman and CEO , Scott Duxbury , has said that a resumption of top - level football in England should be off the agenda until the burden on the NHS has become less severe , adding that he does not think “ football is important at the moment ” .
replaced: Duxbury  Watford chairman and CEO , Scott Duxbury , has said that a resumption of top - level football in England should be off the agenda until the burden on NHS has become less severe , adding that Duxbury does not think top - level football in England is important at the moment ” .

raw: Before the meeting of Premier League executives scheduled for Friday , and with the Bundesliga lined up to be the first major league to restart after a coronavirus lockdown , Duxbury said : “ I feel uncomfortable at this stage even talking about football because there are people dying every day , there are stresses on the NHS , and that has to be the priority .
replaced: Before the meeting of Premier League executives scheduled for Friday , and with the Bundesliga lined up to be the first major league to restart after the lockdown , Duxbury said : “ Duxbury feel uncomfortable at this stage even talking about football because there that people dying every day , there are stresses on NHS , and that has to be the priority .

raw: “ Do I want to resume football ?
replaced: “ Do Duxbury want to resume football ?

raw: Absolutely , and when it ’s safe and the government says it ’s fine and all the players and support staff that follow football can return , then I ’m 100 % behind that .
replaced: Absolutely , and when football ’s safe and the government says football ’s fine and all the players and support staff that follow football can return , then Duxbury ’m 100 % behind that .

raw: But at the moment I feel all efforts have to be on beating the pandemic and supporting the NHS . ”
replaced: But at the moment Duxbury feel all efforts have to be on beating the pandemic and supporting NHS . ”

raw: During the lockdown Watford have opened their stadium up to staff from neighbouring Watford general hospital , as well as those from hospitals in Hemel Hempstead and St Albans .
replaced: During the lockdown  Watford have opened Watford  the stadium up to staff from neighbouring Watford general hospital , as well as those from hospitals in Hemel Hempstead and St Albans .

raw: Executive boxes , including the one leased by the captain , Troy Deeney , have been converted into bedrooms for NHS staff isolating from family members , meeting rooms have been made available , and the club are cleaning 10,000 pairs of scrubs and providing 1,000 free meals a day .
replaced: Executive boxes , including the one leased by the captain , Troy Deeney , have been converted into bedrooms for NHS staff isolating from family members , meeting rooms have been made available , and Watford are cleaning 10,000 pairs of scrubs and providing 1,000 free meals a day .

raw: They are also in the process of converting a separate part of the stadium to host antenatal and postnatal appointments , which will open on Wednesday .
replaced: Watford are also in the process of converting a separate part of the stadium to host antenatal and postnatal appointments , which will open on Wednesday .

raw: Watford are owned by the same family that controls the northern Italian club Udinese , with the two teams also sharing some scouting and administrative staff .
replaced: Watford are owned by the same family that controls the northern Italian club Udinese , with the two teams also sharing some scouting and administrative staff .

raw: Duxbury said : “ I have a lot of friends , a lot of colleagues in Italy , some of whom unfortunately have died because of this and I think it does bring home how serious this situation is .

raw: This is the fight that ’s important , the support that we ’re providing is important .

raw: Of course we have to get back to normality , of course football plays a huge part in that , but at the moment the world finds itself in an awful situation , and this is where our focus needs to be . ”

raw: Earlier this month Watford general hospital declared a critical incident as their oxygen supplies dwindled , but though that particular crisis is over they remain severely stretched .
